price: Dan (jelaslah) bagi mereka akibat buruk dari apa yang telah mereka perbuat dan mereka diliputi oleh pembalasan yang mereka dahulu selalu memperolok-olokkannya.
arabic: وَبَدَا لَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wabadā lahum sayyiātu mā kasabū waḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihi yastahziūna
